greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows where T(m,n) = 2m*n + m + n + 1.
comment: First column: A016789, second column: A016885, third column: A017029, fourth column: A017221, fifth column: A017461. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 21 2012
formula: Row sum: sum_(n=1..m) T(m,n) = m(2m+3)(m+1)/2 = A160378(n+1). [From _R. J. Mathar_, Jan 15 2009, Jan 05 2011]
mathematica: t[n_,k_]:= 2 n*k + n + k + 1; Table[t[n, k], {n, 11}, {k, n}]//Flatten (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 21 2012 *)
program: (MAGMA) [2*n*k + n + k + 1: k in [1..n], n in [1..11]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 21 2012
results.author: _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 13 2009
